Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput

Interface SecureKeypadListenerClearText

  • public interface SecureKeypadListenerClearText
    An interface that will get callbacks from the secure keypad when keypad buttons are pressed. This interface is used for Secure Keypad as Standalone, for example to provide Password in Application. To use Secure Keypad for OTP/Token, use SecureKeypadListener
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onDeleteButtonPressed()
      Called when the user interacts with the secure keypad by pressing the "Delete" button.
      void onError​(String errorMessage)
      Called when errors happened inside secure input.

      Called when the user interacts with the secure keypad and causes a focus change of the input field

      Called when the user presses the keypad button and changes the number of PIN digits in the selected input field.

      Called when the user interacts with the secure keypad by pressing the "OK" button.

    • Method Detail

      • onKeyPressedCountChanged

        void onKeyPressedCountChanged​(int newCount,
                              int inputField)
        Called when the user presses the keypad button and changes the number of PIN digits in the selected input field. Application could update custom UI accordingly to display how many digits have been entered for each input field.
        Parameters:
        newCount - PIN digits count for the selected input field.
        inputField - The currently selected input field. 0 for the first input field, and 1 for the second input field.

      • onInputFieldSelected

        void onInputFieldSelected​(int inputField)
        Called when the user interacts with the secure keypad and causes a focus change of the input field

        Note:
        This method is NOT triggered when input field is changed using the SecureInputUi.selectInputField(int) method.
        Parameters:
        inputField - The current selected input field. 0 for the first input field, and 1 for the second input field.

      • onOkButtonPressed

        void onOkButtonPressed()
        Called when the user interacts with the secure keypad by pressing the "OK" button.

      • onDeleteButtonPressed

        void onDeleteButtonPressed()
        Called when the user interacts with the secure keypad by pressing the "Delete" button.

      • onFinish

        void onFinish​(List<Character> firstPin,
              List<Character> secondPin)
        This method is used to get the callback from the keypad when the user finished entering the pin(s) and pressing the OK button in the end. Please be noted that pin is presented as a secure data object, and the clear text password is not able to be extracted from this secure data object. It's important to be aware that the keypad itself will NOT perform any comparison of the two pin objects.
        Parameters:
        firstPin - Character list that is created from the first input field data
        secondPin - Character list that is created from the second input field data. The secondPin will be null if isDoubleInputField (as one of the parameters of the method buildKeypad) is set as false.

      • onError

        void onError​(String errorMessage)
        Called when errors happened inside secure input.
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - is the message that describes the error.
